loopcity 0.1.0

loopcity

The goal of loopcity is to provide modular functions to call and visualize chromatin interaction communities.

Installation

You can install the development version of loopcity from GitHub with:

# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("sarmapar/loopcity")

Example

This is a basic example which shows you how to solve a common problem:

library(loopcity)
## basic example code
